attributes.action: ensure that Ron Dennis is NOT knighted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ron Dennis, CEO of McLaren Racing, has presided over a company that has been caught indulging in industrial espionage. Dennis has either been complicit in this, or too incompetent to know what is going on within his own company. We believe this is not the kind of person who should be rewarded with a knighthood.
